name: Commander's Horn
description: This appears as a non-unit Neutral card (place on any row), or as a character’s ability (affects only the row the character is played on). It doubles the strength of all unit cards in that row. Limit to 1 per row.

name: Decoy
description: This non-unit Neutral card allows you to swap it with a card on the battlefield to return it to your hand.

name: Hero
description: This unit is immune to any special effects or abilities.

name: Scorch
description: Destroy enemy’s strongest unit in a specific row, if the combined strength of all his or her units is 10 or more. “Scorch” and “Clan Dimom Pirate” cards affect the whole battlefield. “Scorch (Specific Row)” cards (which are all “character” cards, beside the Clan Dimom Pirate) affect only one row.

name: Spy
description: Place on your opponent’s battlefield and draw 2 cards from your deck.

name: Tight Bond
description: Placing this unit next to a card with the same name will double the strength of both cards.

name: Medic
description: After playing this card, choose one card from the discard pile and play it instantly (no Heroes or Special cards).

name: Morale Boost
description: Adds +1 to all units in the row (excluding itself).

name: Muster
description: Find any cards with the same name in your deck and play them instantly.
